thread.title: Premier League Manager of the Month: How many awards has your club won since 1994?
thread.title_full: Premier League Manager of the Month: How many awards has your club won since 1994?

title: Premier League Manager of the Month: How many awards has your club won since 1994?
text:
1 of 37 How many Premier League Manager of the Month awards has your club won? 
We've already revealed which club tops the pile for the most winners of the Premier League Player of the Month award , but who leads the way when it comes to managerial achievements? 
Just three current top flight teams have never had a manager win the monthly accolade, with Bournemouth, Burnley and Stoke City the unlucky outfits missing out. 
Nine sides can boast 10 or more winners, but who is the current table-topper with a whopping 27 Manager of the Month awards? 
Scroll through the gallery above to find out how many monthly awards managers at your club have picked up since the start of the 1993/94 season. Related articles
